[`Keymap`](Keymap)

## Keymap class

Manages keymap lifecycle for different [Scope](Scope)<!-- -->s.

 0.13.9

**Signature:**

```typescript
export class Keymap 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [`isModEvent(evt)`](Keymap/isModEvent) | <code>static</code> | <p>Translates an event into the type of pane that should open. Returns 'tab' if the modifier key Cmd/Ctrl is pressed OR if this is a middle-click MouseEvent. Returns 'split' if Cmd/Ctrl+Alt is pressed. Returns 'window' if Cmd/Ctrl+Alt+Shift is pressed.</p><p> 0.16.0</p> |
|  [`isModifier(evt, modifier)`](Keymap/isModifier) | <code>static</code> | <p>Checks whether the modifier key is pressed during this event.</p><p> 0.12.17</p> |
|  [`popScope(scope)`](Keymap/popScope) |  | <p>Remove a scope from the scope stack. If the given scope is active, the next scope in the stack will be made active.</p><p> 0.13.9</p> |
|  [`pushScope(scope)`](Keymap/pushScope) |  | <p>Push a scope onto the scope stack, setting it as the active scope to handle all key events.</p><p> 0.13.9</p> |
